subject: Re: [junit] Re: build.xml for JUnit 4.4?
msgSnippet: .junit.properties is an optional file that you can put in your home directory to customize the ant build.  If the current script is working as desired, there s
messageBody:
.junit.properties is an optional file that you can put in your home
directory to customize the ant build. If the current script is
working as desired, there's no reason to create the file. Thanks,

David Saff

On 9/5/07, Vitaliy Berdinskikh <skipper13@...> wrote:
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Wayne Fay" <waynefay@...> wrote:

> > You mean this?
> >

>
> Thanks a lot.
>

>
> --
> Regards,
> Vitaliy
